mode_count.description: Number of measurable resonance modes (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = none, 1000 = highly resonant. Zero-padded.

main_freq.description: Primary resonance frequency in Hz (0–20000, pad 5). Zero-padded.

decay.description: Resonance decay time (0–10000, pad 5): 0 = instant/no tail, 10000 = long ring. Zero-padded.

description: RES (prefix), mode count (4 digits), main_freq (5 digits), decay (5 digits); all zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: RES0045012309876 = 0045 modes, 01230 Hz, 09876 ms decay.
